title: Ekko Gameplay/Visual Bug
body:
{{champion:245}} 

The circle placed down on the map for Ekko's W does not appear for me. When the ability finishes winding up the sphere appears, seemingly out of nowhere. This happens on every cast of the ability, every time I verse Ekko. Any help with this bug would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you might have some corrupted or missing assets.

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me.
